successes.title: Zim, the true Consumer-oriented 3D printer
successes.description: Fully Plug & Play (also dual extruders, Ethernet & WiFi, onboard camera, smartphone & tablet control, exclusive refillable cartridges)

Pledges.description: Top quality T-shirt with a very special and unique Zim Kickstarter design! Price includes tax and delivery within US only. International shipping paid separately.

EARLY Zim Special - Get 1 SINGLE head Zim (one extruder) + 1 PLA filament cartridge.
Price does not include tax or delivery (please read section on shipping)
Zim Special - Get 1 SINGLE head Zim (one extruder) + 1 PLA filament cartridge. Price does not include tax or delivery (please read section on shipping)
EARLY Zim Special - Get 1 DUAL head Zim (two extruders) + 2 PLA filament cartridges. Price does not include tax or delivery (please read section on shipping)
Zim Special - Get 1 DUAL head Zim (two extruders) + 2 PLA filament cartridges. Price does not include tax or delivery (please read section on shipping)

RESELLER DEMO PACK OF 2 DUAL HEAD ZIM "FIRST TEST". Get two first DUAL head Zims (two extruders) for demo + 4 PLA filament cartridges. Price does not include tax or delivery (please read section on shipping).

RESELLER DEMO PACK OF 2 DUAL HEAD ZIM. Get two first DUAL head Zims (two extruders) for demo + 20 PLA filament cartridges + 4 PVA filament cartridges + POS advertising + 4 online training sessions of 1 hour each (Skype or similar) + 3 months hot-line support. Price does not include tax or delivery. Shipping will be charged at cost.
